name: Invisibility Potion
description: A potion that grants the user temporary invisibility.
looks: The potion is a clear liquid that seems to shimmer and distort light.

special_effects.Invisibility: Grants temporary invisibility to the user.

name: Sword of Flames
description: A legendary sword that burns enemies with its fiery blade.
looks: The sword has an intricate hilt with flames engraved on the blade. It radiates heat.

special_effects.burning_strike: Has a chance to ignite enemies on hit

name: Fireball Scroll
description: A scroll that contains the Fireball spell.
looks: The scroll is made of parchment and adorned with ancient symbols.

special_effects.ignite: Ignites the target, causing additional damage over time.

name: Elixir of Agility
description: A potion that enhances the drinker's agility and dexterity for a short duration.
looks: The elixir is contained in a small, crystal vial, shimmering with a bright green color.

name: Speedy Boots
description: A pair of boots that increase the wearer's movement speed.
looks: The boots are made of fine black leather with silver accents.

name: Speed Boots
description: These boots give the wearer increased movement speed.
looks: The boots are made of fine leather and have sleek design.

name: Enchanted Ruby
description: A precious gem infused with magical energy.
looks: The ruby is a deep red color and glows with a faint inner light.

special_effects.enhanced_spell_power: Increases the power of spells cast by the wearer.

name: Mysterious Amulet
description: A mysterious amulet with unknown powers.
looks: The amulet is made of a black, shiny material with intricate carvings.

name: Agility Elixir
description: An elixir that enhances agility for a short period of time.
looks: A small, corked glass bottle filled with a clear, shimmering liquid.

name: Iron Sword
looks: The sword has a plain iron blade with a leather-wrapped handle.

special_weapon_skills.Swordsmanship: Increases damage and accuracy with swords.
